name: HotSpot Commando
description:
Fourth project developed at the university. A top-view 2D shooter Hot Line Miami like.  It consists in 3 levels and a boss battle, with a simple story that guide the player. There are no saving points and the levels are connected, expect a medium-high difficulty (40 min of gameplay aprox.) 

It was made with Unity, using additional coding and extra assets (view in game credits). This is a practice not a finish commercial game, therefore expect some issues.
